access: member of the Red Mantis assassins
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Achaekek's Kiss](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1988)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 66 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 13,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** member of the Red Mantis assassins

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Kept as a closely guarded secret by the deadly members of the [Red Mantis assassins](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=17), this poison is treated with reverence for its ability to end lives. If the victim dies while affected by this poison, its body decomposes to nothing in 1 minute, leaving only its gear behind. Non-magical preservation can't protect the tainted corpse. [_Gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131) works on the poisoned body only if cast as a 5th-level spell and the caster succeeds at a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the poison's saving throw DC when casting the spell. Even if cast successfully, gentle repose only works as if it had been cast at 2nd level.

 **Saving Throw** DC 42 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 7d12 poison damage and [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) (1 round); **Stage 2** 9d12 poison damage and doomed 2 (1 round) **Stage 3** 11d12 poison damage and doomed 3 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
